body_html:
Thanks, GridLSTM looks interesting. I will give it a shot. This seems to be a good starting point.

I do have a use-case for this, but it is still in a pilot study. Will be nice to make it into contrib until there are more use-cases.
body_text:
Thanks, GridLSTM looks interesting. I will give it a shot. This seems to be a good starting point.
I do have a use-case for this, but it is still in a pilot study. Will be nice to make it into contrib until there are more use-cases.
body:
Thanks, GridLSTM looks interesting. I will give it a shot. [This](https://github.com/coreylynch/grid-lstm) seems to be a good starting point.

I do have a use-case for this, but it is still in a pilot study. Will be nice to make it into contrib until there are more use-cases.
